# FormatFlagsNativeFloatPacked

**Enumeration Case**

A flag indicating native-endian packed floating-point values.

## Declaration

```swift
FormatFlagsNativeFloatPacked
```

## Discussion

This convienence flag set the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsFloat], [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagsNativeEndian], and [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioFormatFlags/FormatFlagIsPacked] flags.

## Bitwise Layout Flags

- **FormatFlagIsAlignedHigh**: A flag to indicate whether sample bits use the high bits of the channel.
- **LinearPCMFormatFlagIsAlignedHigh**: A flag to indicate whether PCM sample bits use the high bits of the channel.
- **FormatFlagIsPacked**: A flag to indicate whether sample bits use all available bits of the channel.
- **LinearPCMFormatFlagIsPacked**: A flag to indicate whether PCM sample bits use all available bits of the channel.
